amendment.description: To increase appropriations for personnel, equipment, and other resources to be used for the analysis of DNA samples, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3279 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3279 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S12913-12914, S12914-12915; text: CR S12913) To increase appropriations for personnel, equipment, and other resources to be used for the analysis of DNA samples, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3279 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Kyl.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3279 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
